notes.p: The project was conceived by EG. LZ performed sample processing, bioinformatics analyses, and writing of the manuscript. GG and ABG performed experimental processing of the samples, including metatranscriptome and host transcriptome profiling, and contributed to the analyses. PF assisted with 16S rRNA gene profiling, MW performed the host transcriptomic data analysis, and CF and BZ the host co-expression gene network and association analysis with antibiotic resistance and bacterial families. AG and AB designed and conducted the Household Influenza Transmission StuThe samples were clustered into dy (HITS) in Nicaragua. RB and TD contributed to the analyses. LL assisted with the sample organization, data management, sample processing, and analyses. The authors read and approved the final manuscript.
